name: Cylinder Battle
description:
In a world overwrought with bizarre geometric constructions... It's a battle to the death to collect the holy Pis!

Cylinder Battle is an action-packed local multiplayer platformer where you go head-to-head against your fellow player to see who can gather the most Pis. Aggressive enemies, explosive weapons and feats of impressive acrobatics await.

The game is best  enjoyed with a pair of controllers, but is playable for two players on a single keyboard. Controls are as follows:
